alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty rain showers will impact portions of Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a rain showers capable of producing gusty winds across Beaverhead and Madison Counties. These showers are moving to the northeast moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Lima, Pony, Monida, Alder, Silver Star, Harrison, Dell, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Cameron, Waterloo, Glen, Snowline, Red Rock Pass and Jeffers. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 93 . Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 7 , and between mile markers 1 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
